text: What is your housing situation today?

Answers

-Value[x]
*I do not have housing (I am staying with others, in a hotel, in a shelter, living outside on the street, on a beach, in a car, abandoned building, bus or train station, or in a park)

item

linkId: 3

text: Think about the place you live. Do you have problems with any of the following? (check all that apply)

Answers

-Value[x]
*Bug infestation
